sentences.sContent: It's cruel to make fun of a cripple.
If I had a deformed face, you would not make fun of my face.
sentences.sCn: 如果我有一张残缺变形的脸，你们不会取笑我的脸。

sentences.sContent: Do not make fun of anyone for any reason. Teasing shows others you are weak, and ganging up on someone else is cruel.
sentences.sCn: 不要因为任何原因去取笑别人。戏弄别人，只能说明你是弱者，而且联合起来对付某个人是残忍的。
